mapper.select: select d.id, d.sn, d.name, d.parent_id, d.description, d.created_at, d.updated_at, s.id as siteId, s.sn as siteSn, s.name as siteName, s.address as siteAddress, s.description as siteDescription from departments d left join site_depts sd on d.id = sd.dept_id left join sites s on sd.site_id = s.id where d.sn=#{sn}

select d.id, d.sn, d.name, d.parent_id, d.description, d.created_at, d.updated_at, s.id as siteId, s.sn as siteSn, s.name as siteName, s.address as siteAddress, s.description as siteDescription from departments d left join site_depts sd on d.id = sd.dept_id left join sites s on sd.site_id = s.id order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}

select d.id, d.sn, d.name, d.parent_id, d.description, d.created_at, d.updated_at, s.id as siteId, s.sn as siteSn, s.name as siteName, s.address as siteAddress, s.description as siteDescription from departments d left join site_depts sd on d.id = sd.dept_id left join sites s on sd.site_id = s.id where d.name like #{keyword} or d.sn like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}
